name: Mohamed Rawan
aboutMeHeadline: I'm Rawan Mohamed Saad. a Flutter developer , Teaching Assitant , Programming Instructor and Content Creator
aboueMeDetails: I\ Graduated with Computer Science as Majors from AAST 2023. During my university journey, I gained valuable experience in volunteering, content creation, writing ,podcasting, and leadership.I worked a Teaching Assistant @ِAAST of Artificial Intelligence Alamein. I specialize in mobile app development with Flutter, integrating AI. I’m now seeking full-time opportunity role where I can leverage my skills in indusrial ,instruction, content creation, and mentoring. With experience in project monitoring, public speaking, and leadership roles. I bring strong communication, organization, and technical skills, and I’m passionate about learning and development.
